CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Status_Reason__c, 'Escalated CR/P Ticket'), ISPICKVAL( Status_Reason__c, 'Frequent Caller (1-2 times per week)'), ISPICKVAL( Status_Reason__c, 'Escalates Quickly')), 'Yellow', (IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Status_Reason__c, 'Escalated - Clocks'), ISPICKVAL( Status_Reason__c, 'Escalated - Site'), ISPICKVAL( Status_Reason__c, 'At Risk'), ISPICKVAL( Status_Reason__c, 'Persistent Caller (3-5 times per week)')), 'Red', IF(ISPICKVAL(Status_Reason__c, ''), 'Green', ''))))
CustomField.label: Client Status
